- Remove footer text, enable last_updated

New files:
- _includes/hero.liquid
- _sass/_hero.scss
- assets/js/hero.js
- CNAME

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
